title: Browns tough out a win, Gronk update for the Bucs, Raiders DT Soloman Thomas, and Week 7 matchups
itunes:title: Browns tough out a win, Gronk update for the Bucs, Raiders DT Soloman Thomas, and Week 7 matchups
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Peter Schrager, Cris Carter, and Kim Jones explain how the Browns put together a tough win over the Broncos after getting bad news on Baker Mayfield's shoulder. Kim also gives us the incredible background story to Browns' RB D'Ernest Johnson. An update on Gronk's injury while Tom Brady takes a shot at Ohio State? The crew explains why Patrick Mahomes needs to stick to the gameplan while they're also looking forward to the Bengals-Ravens game. Raiders DT Soloman Thomas takes us inside the Vegas locker room plus we break down the best NFL Week 7 matchups.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
